projects.name: National Data Index Compliance for MoHU
projects.problem: The Ministry of Hajj & Umrah needed to integrate 16+ diverse data systems and align with National Data Index (NDI) standards while ensuring data quality across multiple dimensions.
approach: Integrated 16+ data systems from diverse databases into centralized catalog
Applied over 150 Critical Data Elements (CDEs) covering uniqueness, completeness, and validity
Mapped all CDEs to NDI standards for compliance
Implemented automated validation and quality monitoring
Enhanced and governed the ministry’s datasets by reviewing Hajj & Umrah Center data, delivering numerous insights and recommendations.
Focused on improving critical pilgrimage datasets, most notably accommodation data, achieving a 25% improvement in Hajj housing records.
impact: Achieved 80% infrastructure coverage across MoHU systems
Enhanced data governance and compliance with national standards
Significantly improved data quality for MoHU operations
Accelerated reporting during peak Hajj seasons by 20%

projects.name: Predictive Maintenance Optimization
projects.problem: Industrial equipment failures causing unexpected downtime and high maintenance costs without early warning systems.
approach: Developed predictive maintenance framework using Industrial IoT sensors
Applied machine learning algorithms for failure prediction
Implemented real-time monitoring and alert systems
Published research findings in IJACSA journal
impact: Improved machine reliability and extended equipment lifespan
Reduced unexpected breakdowns through early warning system
Research published in International Journal of Advanced Computer Science
Created reusable framework for industrial applications

projects.name: Operations Analysis & Cost Optimization
projects.problem: Boeing Saudi Arabia needed enhanced internal simulation tools and data-driven insights for operational decision-making to reduce costs.
approach: Enhanced internal simulation tools for better operational modeling
Conducted comprehensive analysis of operational processes
Presented insights and recommendations to military stakeholders
Proposed data-driven solutions for cost optimization
impact: Reduced operational costs by 12% through data-driven solutions
Improved decision-making processes for military operations
Enhanced simulation tool capabilities for future use
Delivered actionable insights to senior stakeholders

projects.name: Investment Growth Analysis - TASI & Gold Futures
projects.problem: Investors needed insights into historical performance comparison between Saudi stock market (TASI) and Gold Futures for portfolio diversification decisions.
approach: Analyzed historical performance data from 1998-2023
Compared SAR 1,000 investment growth in TASI vs Gold Futures
Applied statistical analysis for performance metrics
Created visualization dashboards for investment insights
impact: Provided clear portfolio diversification insights for 25-year period
Identified optimal investment allocation strategies
Created reusable framework for future market analysis
Delivered actionable recommendations for investment decisions

projects.name: TechHub Student Club – Founding & Leadership Journey
projects.role: Founding Member → Head of Organizing Committee → co-Leader → Leader
projects.problem: Students at Majmaah University lacked a dedicated platform to connect, learn, and engage in digital skills development. There was a need for a student-driven initiative to foster collaboration, organize events, and promote digital knowledge across the College of Computer Sciences & Information Technology.
approach: Co-founded the TechHub Student Club as part of the core management team
Directed the design and launch of the official TechHub website featuring a gamified points-based system to boost student participation (techhubmu.com)
Applied statistical analysis for performance metrics
Organized and led university-wide exhibitions, bootcamps, workshops, and training programs to promote digital literacy and innovation
impact: Achieved 80% student engagement across the College of Engineering
Secured the Gold Award from Majmaah University for outstanding student initiatives
Built a sustainable digital platform for students to track progress and earn rewards
Established a strong foundation for the club, ensuring continuity and growth for future cohorts

about.bio: Data Scientist with expertise in building scalable analytics solutions and ensuring data quality across complex systems. Currently at Mozn, with previous experience at Ministry of Hajj & Umrah and Boeing Saudi Arabia. Passionate about leveraging AI and machine learning to solve real-world business challenges.

contact.intro: Let's discuss how data science can drive your next breakthrough. I'm always open to exploring new opportunities and collaborations.
contact.availability: Available for freelance projects and full-time opportunities
